author: M P
text:
It will impact State’s economy and boost Kochi’s credentials as an IT hub, says Chandy

Kerala Chief Minister Oommen Chandy has said the delay of over 11 years in the execution of the SmartCity Kochi project is a lesson on how development initiatives should not get bogged down unnecessarily.

Talking at the inauguration of the first IT building of SmartCity Kochi at Kakkanad, near here, on Saturday, Mr. Chandy said the Kerala government and SmartCity were committed to quality employment generation, which would spark of a reverse brain drain to the State. The world would now come to Kerala, he said.
title: SmartCity will bring the world to Kerala: Chandy
